TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35 extends System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension

Docs.summary: Generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations. Expands upon to provide additional functionality for typed datasets created for .NET Framework version 3.5.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35` calls the protected constructor of <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension> to generate typed datasets for the .NET Framework version 3.5 and enable LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update.
> [!NOTE] > LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update are features that were added in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]. > > Also see [Hierarchical Update Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6) and [LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Expands upon <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension> to provide additional functionality for typed datasets for .NET Framework version 3.5.
<xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35> calls the protected constructor of <xref:System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension> to generate typed datasets for .NET Framework version 3.5 and enable LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update.
> [!NOTE] > LINQ to Dataset and hierarchical update are features in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]. See [LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md) and [Hierarchical Update Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6).
